commands.name: set_category
commands.description: Set the category for temp voice channels

commands.name: move
commands.description: Move selected users to another voice channel

commands.name: moveall
commands.description: Move all users from one voice channel to another

commands.name: addname
commands.description: Add a name to the Bones List

commands.name: bone
commands.description: Add +1 bone to a name's count

commands.name: settimezone
commands.description: Set your timezone using a dropdown menu

commands.name: removename
commands.description: Remove a name from the list

commands.name: adjustcount
commands.description: Manually adjust the count for a name

commands.name: help
commands.description: Displays available commands and sends a detailed help menu via DM
